title: Help me
body: How i can put my LOL in spanish, if i play in NA, please help me

replies.body:
Spanish is not a supported language on the NA region, unfortunately. Spanish [**is supported**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) on the EU West and Latin American Regions, however.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
